bibl.title: A Jewish Landowner in Provincia Arabia.
bibl.note: The papyrus, which was acquired by the Shrine of the Book from the estate of the late Yigael Yadin, probably comes from the "Cave of Letters" and may belong to the Babatha archive. Declaration of ownership for a provincial census. Rabbath-of-Moab (Arabia) 4 or 11 dec. 127.
Lewis Naphtali, A Jewish Landowner in Provincia Arabia.
141.4 P. Jerus. Mus. of Israel sans No. d'Inv.
